

| Ryan DSilva |  | [https://linkedin.com/in/dsilva](https://linkedin.com/in/dsilva)    San Francisco ryan@dsilva.org    650-269-7926 |
| :---- | :---: | ----: |

Engagement & retention-focused leader who rallies cross-functional teams to launch & scale products that drive results. Launched multiple Generative AI products in B2B SaaS, Fintech, & Healthtech.

**Experience**  
 **![][image1]**Principal PM \- **Vumedi** ($500M val, 50%+ YoY growth, ‘YouTube for Doctors’)            **2023 \- Present**

- Ideal to launch for Gen AI chapters, increasing engagement by **3x** & session length by **30%**   
- Spun up AI+Data Insights to enable sales with clients, now **used in 100% of client calls**.  
- Hands-on: writing evaluations, context-engineering, & prototyping AI workflows in Python.

**![][image2]**  Lead Product Manager, Enterprise \- **Grammarly (now Superhuman)**			 **2022 \- 2023**

- Launched a ‘Writing Score’ feature on Grammarly’s native apps to boost engagement ([demo](https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/360007144751-What-is-Performance-and-how-is-it-calculated))  
- Gained buy-in for a Generative AI concept, **recently launched as “Readers' Reactions”** ([demo](https://www.grammarly.com/ai-agents/reader-reactions))  
- Defined a novel use of ML embeddings to provide student proof-of-work and retain privacy.

**![][image3]**  Principal Product Manager, Money Movement \- **Eventbrite**				 **2016 \- 2020**

- Led multiple teams in Checkout, Pricing, Payouts & OTC, to scale rev. 4x and prepare for IPO.  
- Drove strategy for a “Buy Tickets” embed, exceeding opt-in goals. Processes **$10B/yr** ([demo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iItwPsWK6xc)).  
- Increased NPS for payments **by 50%** by coordinating a cohesive UX across 4 cross-BU teams.   
- Defined the financial system to declare GAAP earnings, **enabling Eventbrite to IPO** ([video](https://www.eventbrite.com/engineering/3532-2/)).  
- Enabled a **5x quicker** & more robust pricing optimization process by creating pricing regimes.

**![][image4]**  Sr. Product Manager, Revenue & Payments \- **Yelp**					 **2010 \- 2016**

- Teams led: Billing and Payments, 20 engineers & 1 designer, helping Yelp scale 10x and IPO.  
- Grew Yelp Ads signups **by 60%** and reduced paid package revenue churn rate **by 20%**.  
- Co-launched and scaled Yelp's transaction business ([delivery](https://blog.yelp.com/2013/07/yelp-connects-people-with-great-local-businesses-giving-users-plenty-of-information-to-make-spending-decisions-and-allow), [deals, & GC](https://blog.yelp.com/2012/09/gift-certificates)) **from 0-$60M/yr**.  
- Internationalized self-serve/sales SaaS channels for Yelp Ads & Deals to the EU & Canada.  
- Drove fraud rates **down to 25bps**, using rules \+ machine learning & training Ops teams.

**![][image5]**  Product Manager, Fraud & Risk \- **PayPal**							 **2005 \- 2010**

- Managed P/L for PayPal’s B2B fraud prevention product & presented 3x at eBay’s conference.   
- Helped shut down international fraud rings with verification services & data cleansing

**![][image6]![][image7]![][image8]**  Software Engineer → Architect (**IBM, Verisign, Discreet Logic, Ubisoft**)		 **2001 \- 2005**

- Built a fraud prevention system still in use today, now filtering **$100M+/yr** in payment volume.  
- Designed video game tools at Ubisoft and 3D-file optimization systems at Discreet Logic.  

**Education** 

- **MBA @ Santa Clara University, CA.** Awarded ‘**Best Capstone Project’ prize**.  
- **B.Sc. Computer Science** **@ Concordia University, Montreal, Canada \- Valedictorian** & selected for their prestigious Co-Op program (top 5% of students)
